mappings.notes: Zammad Ticket maps to canonical Ticket. Keep state/priority/group as provider-native ExternalObjectRefs until canonical enums and lifecycle semantics are finalised.
Zammad users map to Party; adapter assigns Party role tags (customer/agent) based on permissions/roles.
StoreFile represents file content (deduplicated by sha). Store attaches StoreFile to an object (store_object + o_id).
Ticket articles are messages/comments. Canonical comment model TBD; treat as ExternalObjectRef for MVP.
Tags attach TagItem to TagObject + o_id. Keep tag surfaces provider-native until canonical tagging semantics are defined.
Store is the attachment instance (StoreObject + o_id) linking StoreFile to a domain object. Treat as provider-native; map StoreFile to canonical Document.
